When Price of Souls enters the battlefield, obscure the top card of your library. [i](To obscure a card, exile it face down. You may play that card for as long as it remains exiled on a later turn.)[/i]
Whenever one or more cards are put into exile from anywhere, each opponent loses 1 life. You gain life equal to the amount of life lost this way. This ability triggers only once each turn.
